overview: A serial entrepreneur has over 13 years of business development and software sales experience. He has worked in a business development capacity at two start-ups, Confidant, Inc. and NFR Security Inc. (acquired by Checkpoint Software). His background also includes various roles in enterprise application sales at companies such as Oracle and IBM, and most recently he is a Consulting Partner in custom application development at SAP America. He has a Bachelors of Arts in Behavioral and Social Sciences from the University of Maryland at College Park. Anthony brings to the table a passionate and collaborative team spirit as well as the creative vision for Cogent Mobile. He thinks of himself as the chief Ideologist.
